    Function reference

    All functions

    CIDA_drive_path()
    Get CIDA drive path
    ProjectAnalyst()
    Get Project Analyst
    ProjectLocation()
    Get Project data location on CIDA Drive
    ProjectName()
    Get Project Name
    ProjectPI()
    Get PI Name
    Round()
    Round and don't drop trailing zeros
    SetProjectAnalyst()
    Set Project Analyst
    SetProjectData()
    Set data for project
    SetProjectLocation()
    Set Project Location
    SetProjectName()
    Set Project Name
    SetProjectPI()
    Set PI Name
    backup_project()
    Backup Project Directory
    cida_table1()
    Create a table one
    cida_word_document()
    A wrapper fn for CIDA word doc output
    convertIntervalNotation()
    Convert Interval Notation
    create_project()
    Create Project Directory + readme files
    find_nearest() getlower()
    Find the nearest observation to another observation
    list_kables()
    List tables with the same columns
    nLevelsP()
    Get pretty number of levels
    nrowP()
    Get pretty numbers of rows
    pvalr()
    Pretty p-values
    pvalue()
    Internal function for p-value calculation in cida_table1
    read_xlsx_color()
    Read in xlsx with fill colour
    removeAnalyst()
    Remove Default Analyst from ~/.Rprofile
    setAnalyst()
    Set Default Analyst Value
    setPermanentAnalyst()
    Set Default Analyst Value
    sum_ignore_NA()
    Sum ignoring NAs
    vec_power()
    Vectorized power estimates

    Developed by CIDA Research Tools Committee.
